articles.title: Want to learn Korean? K-pop stars Blackpink can help you with that - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Blackpink In Your Korean is a set of teaching materials that helps users pick up native expressions and vocabulary through scenario-based learning and conversations with Lisa, Jennie, Jisoo and Rose.
articles.content:
Calling all Blinks across the globe you can now learn Korean from your favourite K-pop group through a teaching package called Blackpink In Your Korean.
The 12-chapter teaching material set follows … [+978 chars]

articles.title: Actress Barbie Hsu marries former boyfriend, South Korean musician DJ Koo, three months after her divorce - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The two had dated for a year in the late 1990s and he got back in touch with her after hearing about her divorce from Chinese businessman, Wang Xiaofei.
articles.content:
Koo added that he had reached out to the singer-actress after hearing about her divorce.
When I heard the news of her divorce, I dug out her number from over 20 years ago and contacted her. Thankful… [+906 chars]
